oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Park headquarters and adminstration building
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This postcard provides an image of the main administration building in the Great Smoky Mountains National Park.
In 1939 - 1940, Public Works Administration funding along with Civilian Conservation Corps labor helped produce the Great Smoky Mountains National Park main administration building at Sugarlands.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Great Smoky Mountains National Park (N.C. and Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Great Smoky Mountains National Park (N.C. and Tenn.)
